form.pullUpCountDesc: Enter the number of consecutive pull-ups you completed in the video.
form.videoUrlDesc: Please upload your video to YouTube, Instagram, or TikTok and paste the public link here. Make sure your video is publicly accessible.
form.req1: Clear, unobstructed view of the full movement
form.req2: Chin must clear the bar for each rep
form.req3: Full arm extension at the bottom of each rep
form.req4: Hands must be shoulder-width apart; grip should not exceed 4 feet in width
form.req5: Continuous recording without cuts or edits
form.checkbox1: I confirm that my video link is correct and publicly viewable without requiring login or special access. I understand that inaccessible links may lead to disqualification and that submission fees are non-refundable.
form.checkbox2: I confirm this video is authentic and unedited, with no AI or effects used to alter my performance. Any tampering or misrepresentation will result in disqualification and loss of any fees, rankings, or rewards.
form.checkbox3: I grant Pull-Up Club permission to use my submitted videos in current and future marketing efforts‚Äîboth branded and unbranded‚Äîacross all platforms, in perpetuity, without limitation or additional compensation.
form.checkbox4: By submitting this form, I agree to be automatically enrolled in Pull-Up Club email and SMS communications. I understand that I can unsubscribe from either channel at any time by following the opt-out instructions included in each message.
form.reviewTime: Please allow up to 15 days for our team to review and properly assign your submission to the month it was submitted.
